description.displayText: Lily is just wonderful.   She's so warm, patient, smart, and, of course, super dependable.  My 5.5yo had an amazing sitter right before Lily, so Lily had a high bar to live up to, but my daughter is in love again.  My daughter may want to do 10 different pretend play scenarios in a half hour, and Lily is right there with her assuming all the roles.  Lily has also done an amazing job getting my daughter through remote days at school when it's the last thing my daughter wants to do.  My daughter can be so high energy and stubborn, but Lily is so calm and patient where I could not have been.  She's a gem.

My daughter may want to do 10 different pretend play scenarios in a half hour, and Lily is right there with her assuming all the roles.  Lily has also done an amazing job getting my daughter through remote days at school when it's the last thing my daughter wants to do.  My daughter can be so high energy and stubborn, but Lily is so calm and patient where I could not have been.  She's a gem.

description.displayText: Lily is a super dependable and intelligent young women who has worked for my family for four years. I have two children who could not be more different from one another, and Lily is equally good with both of them. My daughter is quiet and very bookish, and Lily is great with homework help, making quiet reading time, and taking her to the library and bookstore. My son is younger and much more hyper and energetic, and every time we come home they've built a Lego set together, played soccer, made snacks together, and he's had time to play around and be himself. Lily is the BEST with homework help.
